content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Dec 2018I just had a work presentation, and my boss mentioned that I need to work on my presentation skills. I gone for some courses, but they don't seem to be helping. How else can I improve myself?5 answersAnswerBump0

Adrian Goh Jun Wei, Product at NodeflairLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Jan 2019Ask your boss to elaborate on what exactly needs to be improved and ask for examples so that you know what to improve and what mistakes to avoid. Other than that, practise like what everyone else suggested.0 comments0

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 13 Dec 2018As with anything else people want to be good at, practise! Record yourself while you're at it, then watch the video and review what can be done better! Do not criticise yourself because it will only think about negative thoughts. Instead, think of what can be improved, then try again!0 comments0

Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Dec 2018Attend some professional development courses on presentation move away from slides and learn to be a story teller Get feedback from your friends and colleagues on areas of improvement. You can’t fix it when you don’t know what’s the issuefrequency - try to volunteer to do presentation. If you keep presenting then the content becomes 2nd nature then you can focus on the presentation techniques 0 comments0

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Dec 2018Rehearse, rehearse and rehearse. Practiced Infront of the mirror or your friends and gather feedback for improvement. Maintain eye contact and know your stuff inside out!0 comments0

Last but not least, join the Toastmasters club or equivalent. :) 0 comments0
